catalog_script_client.name: Calculate event end time

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Shepherd Event Request">46ddfcd3db4e2890daa50825ca9619b3</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Calculate event end time</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    //g_form, function_date_time, function_duration
	// function_date_time - grab time portion to calculate end time
	//	function_start_time (form)
	//function_end_time (form)
	//
	
	var starttime = getTime (g_form.getValue('function_date_time'));
	var endtime = starttime + (g_form.getValue('function_duration'));
	g_form.setValue('function_end_time', endtime);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DLADMIN</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-16 21:28:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>5aaef5f7dbb2ec10daa50825ca961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate event end time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Event Management" source="x_shce_event_manag">8658dffadb02e490daa50825ca9619d7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Event Management">8658dffadb02e490daa50825ca9619d7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5aaef5f7dbb2ec10daa50825ca961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DLADMIN</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-16 21:28:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
